alert.note: Alert for Haskell; Jones; Shackelford (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 7:12PM CDT until June 17 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Haskell County in west central Texas... Northern Jones County in west central Texas... Northwestern Shackelford County in west central Texas... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 711 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Tuxedo, or 8 miles west of Stamford, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Anson around 730 PM CDT. Stamford and Avoca around 745 PM CDT. Lueders around 800 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Funston, Big Country Baptist Assembly, The Intersection Of Us- 180 And Farm Road 600 and Tuxedo. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
